name: FortKnoxster
description:
FortKnoxster is a cyber-security company that uses end-to-end encryption and blockchain technology to offer private and secure messaging, calling, and storage. 

FortKnoxster uses smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain and IPFS. FortKnoxsterâ€™s users connect with each other through cryptographic signatures, thereby establishing a trusted communication link. Knoxstertoken (FKX) is a live utility token, allowing FortKnoxster users to upgrade to FortKnoxster PRO purchasing extra encrypted storage and PRO features using FKX tokens. 

More information can be found at https://fortknoxster.com/.
